doc:
Germaine Dermoz https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Germaine_Dermoz 0 Germaine Dermoz (born Germaine Deluermoz, 30 July 1888 – 6 November 1966) was a French film and theatre actress of the early-to-mid twentieth century. She performed in over twenty theatre productions, frequently in the Théâtre Réjane. Her film career took place mostly during the silent movie era. She is most famous for her portrayal of Madame Beudet in The Smiling Madame Beudet. She had an older sister, actress Jeanne Delvair née Duluermoz (1877-1949), and a younger brother, Henri Deluermoz (1876-1943), who was a painter. Germaine_Dermoz ( born Germaine_Deluermoz , 30_July_1888 – 6_November_1966 ) was a_French_film_and_theatre_actress of the_early-to-mid_twentieth_century . She performed in over_twenty_theatre_productions , frequently in the_Théâtre_Réjane . Her_film_career took place mostly during the_silent_movie_era . She is most_famous for her_portrayal of Madame_Beudet in The_Smiling_Madame_Beudet . She had an_older_sister , actress_Jeanne_Delvair_née_Duluermoz_(_1877-1949_) , and a_younger_brother , Henri_Deluermoz_(_1876-1943_) , who was a_painter .
